00092             function                validate_account_fields( $Options )
00093             {
00094                   try
00095                   {
00096                         $User = $this->UserAccess->select_list( $this->Security->get_p( 'user_record_id' , 'integer_list' ) );
00097                         $User = $User[ 0 ];
00098                         
00099                         $Email = $this->Security->get_p( 'email' , 'email' );
00100                         if( $User->email != $Email && $this->UserAccess->email_exists( $Email ) )
00101                         {
00102                               $this->PageComposer->add_error_message( 'email_exists' );
00103                               return( false );
00104                         }
00105                         
00106                         if( $this->PermitAlgorithms->object_has_permit( false , 'user' , 'user_manager' ) === false )
00107                         {
00108                               $Password = $this->Security->get_p( 'current_password' , 'string' );
00109                               if( $this->UserAccess->validate_auth( $User->login , $Password ) === false )
00110                               {
00111                                     $this->PageComposer->add_error_message( 'illegal_current_password' );
00112                                     return( false );
00113                               }
00114                         }
00115                         
00116                         return( true );
00117                   }
00118                   catch( Exception $e )
00119                   {
00120                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00121                   }
00122             }

00146             function                vaidate_non_system( $Options )
00147             {
00148                   try
00149                   {
00150                         $ids = $this->Security->get_global( '_id_' , 'integer' , CHECKBOX_IDS );
00151                         
00152                         if( isset( $ids[ 0 ] ) )
00153                         {
00154                               $ids = implode( ',' , $ids );
00155                               
00156                               $Users = $this->UserAccess->unsafe_select( $this->UserAccess->NativeTable.
00157                                     ".id IN( $ids ) AND `system` = 1" );
00158 
00159                               if( isset( $Users[ 0 ] ) )
00160                               {
00161                                     $PageComposer = get_package( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00162                                     $PageComposer->add_error_message( 'cant_delete_system_users' );
00163 
00164                                     return( false );
00165                               }
00166                               
00167                               return( true );
00168                         }
00169                         
00170                         return( false );
00171                   }
00172                   catch( Exception $e )
00173                   {
00174                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00175                   }
